webforest 0.2.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Column helper: Interval display (e.g., "1.2 (0.9, 1.5)")

Source: R/classes-components.R
col_interval.Rd

Display point estimates with confidence intervals. By default, uses the point/lower/upper columns defined at the plot level, but these can be overridden with the point, lower, and upper arguments.

col_interval(
  header = "95% CI",
  width = NULL,
  decimals = 2,
  sep = " ",
  point = NULL,
  lower = NULL,
  upper = NULL,
  imprecise_threshold = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

header

Column header (default "95% CI")

width

Column width in pixels (NULL for auto-sizing based on content)

decimals

Number of decimal places (default 2)

sep

Separator between point and CI (default " ")

point

Optional field name to override the point estimate column

lower

Optional field name to override the lower bound column

upper

Optional field name to override the upper bound column

imprecise_threshold

When upper/lower ratio exceeds this threshold, the interval is considered imprecise and displayed as "—" instead. The forest plot marker is also hidden. Default is NULL (no threshold).

...

Additional arguments passed to web_col(), including cell styling: bold, italic, color, bg, emphasis, muted, accent (column names)

Value

A ColumnSpec object

Examples

# Default formatting
col_interval()
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "_interval"
#>  @ header        : chr "95% CI"
#>  @ field         : chr "_interval"
#>  @ type          : chr "interval"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ interval:List of 6
#>  ..  ..$ decimals          : num 2
#>  ..  ..$ sep               : chr " "
#>  ..  ..$ point             : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ lower             : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ upper             : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ impreciseThreshold: NULL
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# Custom decimals and separator
col_interval("HR (95% CI)", decimals = 3, sep = ", ")
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "_interval"
#>  @ header        : chr "HR (95% CI)"
#>  @ field         : chr "_interval"
#>  @ type          : chr "interval"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ interval:List of 6
#>  ..  ..$ decimals          : num 3
#>  ..  ..$ sep               : chr ", "
#>  ..  ..$ point             : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ lower             : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ upper             : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ impreciseThreshold: NULL
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# Override interval fields (show different effect than plot)
col_interval("Per-Protocol", point = "pp_hr", lower = "pp_lower", upper = "pp_upper")
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "_interval_pp_hr"
#>  @ header        : chr "Per-Protocol"
#>  @ field         : chr "_interval_pp_hr"
#>  @ type          : chr "interval"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ interval:List of 6
#>  ..  ..$ decimals          : num 2
#>  ..  ..$ sep               : chr " "
#>  ..  ..$ point             : chr "pp_hr"
#>  ..  ..$ lower             : chr "pp_lower"
#>  ..  ..$ upper             : chr "pp_upper"
#>  ..  ..$ impreciseThreshold: NULL
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# Hide imprecise estimates (CI ratio > 10)
col_interval(imprecise_threshold = 10)
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "_interval"
#>  @ header        : chr "95% CI"
#>  @ field         : chr "_interval"
#>  @ type          : chr "interval"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ interval:List of 6
#>  ..  ..$ decimals          : num 2
#>  ..  ..$ sep               : chr " "
#>  ..  ..$ point             : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ lower             : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ upper             : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ impreciseThreshold: num 10
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL
